source: Trump Orders Declassification of Intelligence Documents Related to Former Adviser Carter Page. President Trump ordered the declassification of sensitive documents related to the investigation into Russian election interference, a move that could eventually allow the public unprecedented access to a probe that he has repeatedly railed against.
Declassification of Carter Page Warrants May Be Politically Motivated, but More Transparency Is Still Good. Also, more text messages!
President Trump just seriously escalated his efforts to interfere with Mueller’s probe. He’s ordered the release of many unredacted texts from officials involved in the Russia investigation.
target: Trump Orders Declassification of Documents Related to Russia Probe. President Trump ordered the declassification of several documents related to the FBI's investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election, including text messages from Peter Strzok and James Comey as well as the FISA warrant for former campaign aide Carter Page.
